ResourceHeader.Description: The VLF/ELF crossed loop antenna and Valey antenna were settled by Prof. Shiokawa of ISEE.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the principal investigator (PI) of the VLF/ELF observation, Prof. K. Shiokawa (shiokawa at isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) before using the data. The VLF/ELF observation at the Moshiri Observatory of ISEE had been continuously supported by Masayuki Sera and Yuji Ikegami, both are the technical staffs of ISEE.

InformationURL.Name: ISEE VLF/ELF Data
InformationURL.Description: The history of the configuration and quick-look data are available. All the plotted data and images are just for browsing purpose and are not fully calibrated. Please do not use the data at any presentations and publications without contacting the PI.
